application.doc: Retrieving the list of authorization servers

method.name: POST
method.id: Retrieving the list of authorization servers
method.doc: To retrieve the list of authorization servers, issue an HTTP POST command on the authorization servers resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: user
param.doc: The Security Verify Access administrative user.

param.name: password
param.doc: The password for the Security Verify Access administrative user.

param.name: domain
param.doc: The domain for the Security Verify Access administrative user.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.

representation.name: azn_server_state
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.

param.name: id
param.doc: The name of the authorization server.

param.name: state
param.doc: The state of the authorization server. (0 == running, 1 == not running)
